title: Let’s Twist Again
lyrics:
[drums only]
Come on everybody
Clap your hands
Aaaah, you looking good
I'm gonna sing my song
It won't take long
We're gonna do the twist
and it goes like this
 
[strum]
Come on let's (C)twist again, like we did last (Am)summer!
Yeaaah, let's (F)twist again, like we did last (G7)year!
Do you re(C)member when, things were really (Am)hummin',
Yeaaaah, let's (F)twist again, (G7) twistin' time is (C)here!
 
Heeee, and (F)round and round and up and down we (C)gooo again!
Oh, (F)baby, make me know you love me (G7)sooooo, and then:
 
Leeet’s (C)twist again, like we did last (Am)summer,
Come on, let's (F)twist again, (G7) like we did last (C)year!
 
| (C)  (C) | (Am)  (Am) | (F)  (G7) | (C) [spoken] (C)Who's that, flyin up there
(C) Is it a bird?
(Am)(Noooooo!) - Is it a plane?
(F)(Noooooooo!) - (G7) Is it the twister?
(C)(YEAAAAAAAHH!)
 
Yeaaaah, let’s (C)twist again, like we did last (Am)summer!
Come on, let's (F)twist again, like we did last (G7)year!
Do you re(C)member when, things were really (Am)hummin',
Come on, let's (F)twist again, (G7) twistin' time is (C)here!
 
Heeee, and (F)round and round and up and down we (C)gooo again!
Oh, (F)baby, make me know you love me (G7)sooooo, and then:
 
Come on, let’s (C)twist again, like we did last (Am)summer,
Yeaaah, let's (F)twist again, (G7) like we did last (C)year!
Come on, let's (F)twist again, (G7) twistin' time is (C)here!
(C - cha cha cha) [end]
